question: how to make a girl like me?
answer:
QUESTION
salaam. i know this girl that i want to marry, but she isnt sure. is there any wazifahs i can do to make her fall in love with me? i mean to make her sure that this is right thing for her to do? any dua or prayer? thanks wasalaam
ANSWER


Share:
Let her make up her own mind. Do not pressurise her, otherwise she may regret later in life.

Continue to make du?aa that Allah guides her to what is best. His knowledge is complete and ours is limited. He is our guide in all matters.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Ml. Imraan Vawda
FATWA DEPT.
